name: My Magic Horse Care Academy
description:
Create and enjoy this beautiful world of unicorn dreams!

The stable is the home of our horses and ponies friends! Let's create the best place for them to live?

As a designer, you can reform all the details of this place. Choose the best floor, wall and portal for your beautiful horse. There are many things to do in your pet home!

Horses and ponies need to feel comfortable and relaxed to receive beauty care. Turn this place into a comfortable house for them; is your goal of the game!

Through the different levels of this incredible game for kids, you can groom the horse mane and brush his hair. Let's do a horse beauty makeover like never before! Have fun!!

GAME FEATURES:

- Amazing graphics!
- Horse makeover: change the look of your favorite animals!
- Take care of the horse tail and prepare the horse to play outside on the meadow!
- Change the hairstyle and prove new designs!
- Share with your friends all your dress up creations!

Welcome to this magical game! Play now!
